note: Poet 📝 and artist 🎨 📸 from the Lake District 🇬🇧. Simple poems, classical 🏛️ style. Passionate about the beauty of nature 🌳 and the power of words 💤. Inspired 💡 by rolling hills 🏔️, deep lakes 🚣‍♀️, and the wild creatures 🦉🦌🐝🐟 that inhabit Britain’s stunning landscape 🏞️. My live poetry journal 📖 provides a chronology ⏱️📆 of the seasons ☁️☀️🍁❄️. I'm always looking for new ways to bring my poems to life 🌱. Artwork 🖼️ is distorted, reflecting the haziness 😶‍🌫️ of memory 🧠 and the otherworldliness 🌍🌎🌏 of dream 😴
